review: Stream online video, music to your TV using your smartphone, tablet, or laptop; Available for Windows computers running Windows 7 or higher is what they say. Well not all! It does not support Silverlight or Quicktime, which means you can not play off of Amazon prime. Nor does it seem to work on netflix accessed from outside the us. All in all i'd say it's very limited. If what you want is put whats on your computer screen on your tv screen try another device.

review: I got this device today and installed it right away in one of my TV's using a HP laptop.The installation was very easy and the only thing that requires is using Chrome. Soon I expect to test using it through a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.I have been using it to watch YouTube and it works perfectly well (so far!).I was able to close my profile in the laptop, open a different profile and the video kept playing uninterrupted on the TV.(Finally I do not have to use a VGA cable from the notebook to the TV!).
